author: aljosa
title: OctoWars - a DCCG based world
description: Cardano doesn't have a high quality game which can be played indefinitely and can gain new users every day.
solution: OctoWars is a game with enough materials in the core story to be expanded indefinitely and expose players to the Cardano ecosystem.
experience:
Aljosa Mohorovic is a senior developer with team lead, product and business owner experience.
